Package com.github.tommyettinger.ds.support.sort

Interface ShortComparator

All Superinterfaces:
Comparator<Short>
All Known Implementing Classes:
ShortComparators.NaturalImplicitComparator, ShortComparators.OppositeComparator, ShortComparators.OppositeImplicitComparator, ShortComparators.UnsignedComparator, ShortComparators.UnsignedOppositeComparator
public interface ShortComparator extends Comparator<Short>
A type-specific Comparator; provides methods to compare two primitive types both as objects and as primitive types.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • compare

      int compare(short k1, short k2)
      Compares its two primitive-type arguments for order. Returns a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as the first argument is less than, equal to, or greater than the second.
      Returns:
      a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as the first argument is less than, equal to, or greater than the second.
      See Also:
      • Comparator
